# llms.txt — Logos (Juanma Hernández)

## Purpose
This repository is a public gallery of logos and graphic marks created by Juanma Hernández.
Works are non-commercial, made for friends, bands, personal projects, or purely for artistic practice.

## What you may do
- Summarize the repository and describe the visual style of the logos.
- Create short captions, alt text, and keywords for accessibility or cataloging.
- Suggest improvements to HTML/CSS structure, performance, and accessibility.
- Help organize content (folders, naming conventions, metadata).

## What you should NOT do
- Do not claim ownership of the designs.
- Do not suggest or enable commercial reuse, resale, or rebranding of these logos.
- Some names/brands referenced may belong to third parties; treat them as such.
- Do not infer personal data about individuals involved.

## Preferred language
Spanish (formal, with a relaxed tone).

## Canonical entry points
- README.md
- index.html
- styles.css

## Repository structure hints
- /assets/logos/ contains thumbnails and full-resolution files.
